text: 10|23|Va cun [Alloh taolo] naçotaşon medihad, ʙa nohaq dar zamin sarkaşī [va sitam] mekunand. Ej mardum, sarkaşī [va sitami] şumo tanho ʙa zijoni xudaton ast, [caro ki faqat] ʙahrai [nocize az] zindagii dunjo [meʙared va] sipas ʙozgaştaton ʙa sūji Mo xohad ʙud,on goh şumoro az onci mekarded, ʙoxaʙar mesozem
